heroSummary.title: The Comeback King of Season 2024
heroSummary.story: Your season told the story of resilience and adaptation. Starting the year with a rough 45% win rate on tanks, you discovered your true calling in the bot lane. By mid-season, your Jinx mechanics had evolved from 'respectable' to 'terrifying,' with a signature late-game power spike that turned 15 losses into comeback victories. Your teammates learned to trust the '20-minute Jinx insurance policy.' The data reveals a player who transforms defeats into lessonsâ€”your average CS/min jumped from 5.8 to 7.1 over 6 months. This wasn't luck; this was deliberate mastery.

keyMoment.description: The legendary 1v3 outplay at Baron pit that won the game

coachingTips.title: Master the 'Auto-Spacing' Drill
coachingTips.problem: You're dying 20% more in the 10-15 minute mark compared to top ADC players in your elo.
coachingTips.solution: Spend 10 minutes daily in Practice Tool practicing 'attack-move-click' combos while maintaining 550 range from training dummies.
coachingTips.measurableGoal: Reduce mid-game deaths from 2.3 to 1.5 per game over 20 matches.
coachingTips.whyItMatters: Your late-game carry potential is elite, but you lose 28% of games before reaching it. Surviving mid-game unlocks your win condition.

coachingTips.title: Upgrade Your Support's Vision Score
coachingTips.problem: Your vision score is 18% below the 75th percentile for ADCs in Platinum+.
coachingTips.solution: Buy control wards on every back (even if you have one). Place defensively in river pixel brush during lane phase.
coachingTips.measurableGoal: Increase vision score from 28.5 to 35+ per game.
coachingTips.whyItMatters: Your KDA jumps from 2.9 to 4.1 in games where your team has vision control. You're mechanically ready for Diamondâ€”vision discipline is the gap.

coachingTips.title: Add a Safe Blind Pick
coachingTips.problem: 61% of your losses occur when Jinx is banned or picked. Your backup champions (Caitlyn, Ashe) have 8% lower win rates.
coachingTips.solution: Learn Ezreal (safe into most matchups) or Kai'Sa (similar late-game fantasy). Dedicate 15 normals to building muscle memory.
coachingTips.measurableGoal: Achieve 52%+ win rate on secondary pick over 20 ranked games.
coachingTips.whyItMatters: Climbing requires consistency across patches and metas. Right now, you're a Jinx one-trick with a vulnerability.

playstyleRadar.analysis: You're an elite teamfighter (92nd percentile) with exceptional objective prioritization. Your weak link is vision controlâ€”addressing this single metric could unlock a full division of climb.

roastMode.title: The Roast You Didn't Ask For
roastMode.roast: You play ADC like you're allergic to control wards. I've seen junglers with better vision scores. Your mechanics scream Diamond, but your minimap awareness whispers 'what's a minimap?' That one game where you face-checked a bush at 35 minutes with Baron up? The enemy team is STILL laughing. Also, stop building Stormrazor third item on Jinx. It's not Season 8 anymore, friend.

hiddenGems.title: The 'Invisible Carry' Phenomenon
hiddenGems.insight: You win 68% of games where you have fewer than 10 kills but more than 15 assists. You're not a KDA playerâ€”you're a win-condition enabler.

hiddenGems.title: Patch 13.18 Awakening
hiddenGems.insight: Your win rate jumped 14% after Patch 13.18 (Jinx buffs). You're not just playing the championâ€”you're optimizing around patch notes. That's pro-level game sense.

hiddenGems.title: The Duo Gap
hiddenGems.insight: When you duo with support 'MissFortuneHater69', your win rate is 63%. Solo queue? 51%. The synergy is real. Duo more.

socialShareCard.headline: Season 2024: The Comeback King
socialShareCard.quote: Turned 15 losses into comeback victories with late-game Jinx mastery.
